content.raw:
Code is running fine for me but you're right it could break stuff will change that.

Mh I'm not sure  ```Output``` really needs the default value to be configurable as I only see a use case for static outputs (which would include digitals as well) but there should be no harm in moving it to Output so I'll change that. Thanks.
content.html:
Code is running fine for me but you're right it could break stuff will change that.

Mh I'm not sure Output really needs the default value to be configurable as I only see a use case for static outputs (which would include digitals as well) but there should be no harm in moving it to Output so I'll change that. Thanks.
